comments.hide:
Are you sure you want to hide this comment? It will become hidden in your post, but will still be visible via the comment's permalink.

All child comments in this thread will also be hidden.

For further actions, you may consider blocking this person and/or reporting abuse.

messages.failure: すでに存在しています

subscription.all_desc: すべての新着コメントについて通知を受け取ります。
subscription.author: 記事の作者のコメント
subscription.author_desc: 記事の作者がコメントした時だけ通知を受け取ります。
subscription.top_desc: 返信でないコメントについてだけ通知を受け取ります。

type.top_level_comments: 独立したコメントのみ

subscription.unsubscribed: この記事のコメント欄の通知を切りました

content.placeholder: ここから本文を書きます

cover.aria_label: 見出し画像をアップロードする
cover.number: 一度に一枚の画像しかドロップできません

basic.desc1: You are currently using the basic markdown editor that uses

basics.desc2: で記事の体裁を整えます。
basics.desc4: を使って、ツイートや YouTube 動画などの高度なコンテンツを入れることができます。
basics.desc5: ドラッグアンドドロップで画像を本文中に加え、見出し画像としても挿入できます。
basics.heading: 編集の基本

tag.desc1: タグは記事を見つけやすくします。
tag.desc2: 記事にふさわしいテーマや分類を表したものと考えるとわかりやすいです。
tag.desc3: 一つの記事につきタグを最大 4 つまで、コンマ区切りで入力してください。適切な読者層に届くようにタグを組み合わせましょう。
tag.desc4: できるだけ既存のタグを使いましょう。
tag.desc5: Some tags, such as “help” or “healthydebate”, have special posting guidelines.
tag.heading: タグの入れ方

title.desc1: 簡潔で、読みたくなるような、そして記事の内容をよく言い表したタイトルをつけましょう。
title.desc2: 記事を探す人が検索で見つけやすいよう、適切なキーワードを含めましょう。
title.heading: 良いタイトルをつける

image.aria_label: 画像をアップロードする

leave.no: いいえ、編集を続けます

errors.wrong: Something went wrong: ${error}. -- Please refresh the page to try again.

feedback.block:
The message will be reported.

Would you like to block this person as well?

This will:
- prevent them from commenting on your posts
- block all notifications from them
- prevent them from messaging you via chat
feedback.blocked: Your report has been submitted and the user has been blocked
feedback.desc: Thank you for reporting any abuse that violates our <0>code of conduct</0> or <1>terms and conditions</1>. We continue to try to make this environment a great one for everybody.
feedback.heading: Report Abuse
feedback.listings: 告知の内容や分類が不適切

flagUser.already: It seems you've already reduced the visibility of this author's posts.
flagUser.desc: Thanks for keeping DEV safe. Here is what you can do to flag this user:
flagUser.heading: Flag User
flagUser.less: All posts by this author will be less visible.
flagUser.vomit: Make all posts by this author less visible
flagUser.vomit_desc: This author consistently posts content that violates DEV's code of conduct because it is harassing, offensive or spammy.

body_markdown.desc: 400 characters max, 12 line break max, no images allowed, *markdown is encouraged*. Please include a contact method if necessary.
body_markdown.label: Body Markdown

org.desc: Posting on behalf of an organization spends the organization's credits.

main.forem_icon: Dismiss banner: Open with the Forem app

defaultAlt.context: Consider replacing the 'alt text' in square brackets at %{place} with a description of the image
defaultAlt.description: Images should not have the default alt text

emptyAlt.context: Consider adding an image description in the square brackets at %{place}
emptyAlt.description: Images should not have empty alt text

headingIncr.context: Consider changing the heading "%{place}" to a level %{level} heading by using "%{start}"
headingIncr.description: Heading levels should only increment by one level at a time

levelOne.context: Consider changing "%{place}" to a level two heading by using "##"
levelOne.description: Heading level one should not be used in posts

modActions.clear: This will clear your current "Add a tag" input. Do you want to continue?

modActions.thumbsup: This post will be more visible.

modActions.unpublish: You are unpublishing this article; are you sure?

profile.block:
Are you sure you want to block this person? This will:
- prevent them from commenting on your posts
- block all notifications from them
- prevent them from messaging you via Connect
- hide their posts from your feed
profile.to_flag: Are you sure you want to flag this person? This will make all of their posts less visible.
profile.to_unflag: Are you sure you want to unflag this person? This will make all of their posts visible again.
